name: A date with your serial killer
name_original: A date with your serial killer
description:
You get into online dating with the hope of meeting someone new, but after failed date after date you want to give up, but after coming across an app for blind dating you decide you may want to try just one more date. You match with a blank profile, they send you a location so you go to meet them, I mean what could go wrong?

This game is currently a demo, it is being developed, at the moment of update it is currently 4-8 minutes long (depending on reading speed)

Your date with a serial killer is visual novel that has the following themes:

Flashing imagery

Eyestrain

Disturbing themes

Romance

Death/murder

Stalking
